statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB+';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE blood_type IN ('O+', 'A-');
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, height, weight FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'A+' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE height >= 170 AND weight <= 70 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis ILIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT record_date, temperature FROM health_records WHERE temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, diagnosis_name FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id JOIN treatments ON diagnoses.diagnosis_id = treatments.diagnosis_id;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT address FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM Visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE prescribed_by='Dr. Smith'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.patient_name, v.visit_date, v.doctor_name, v.diagnosis FROM Patients p JOIN Visits v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY v.visit_date DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, m.dosage, m.prescribed_by FROM Patients p JOIN Medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.dosage > '50mg';
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan, date_of_record FROM MedicalRecord WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Influenza%';
SELECT specialty, experience_years FROM Doctor WHERE experience_years > 10;
SELECT patient_id, issue_description FROM HealthIssue ORDER BY identified_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, location FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecord WHERE date_of_record >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_record ASC;
SELECT * FROM Doctor WHERE experience_years > 5 AND specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patient p JOIN Appointment a ON p.id = a.patient_id JOIN Doctor d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
